name: Melodier
description:
Challenge yourself in this minimalistic puzzle game about musical melodies.

Connect the blocks

Move freely around the scenery and connect the blocks in the form you think will solve the puzzle

Solve the puzzle

Try and connect the blocks in the way described on the level, once you reach the position you completed it!

Discover the Melody

Once you solve the puzzle a piece of melody will be unlocked, do you know them? (Based on over 30 popular melodies)

Enjoy the process!

Move, connect, solve and discover in over 50 hand-crafted levels in an easy and intuitive way



Remember, you can always undo your actions till the beginning of each level



If you like the game, Wishlist now!
